entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Arviat
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 20.
